'''2.3.394''' is an update to the [[Minecraft Launcher|launcher]] released on August 31, 2022.

== Additions ==
* Version number added to Launcher main page for easier debugging.

== Fixes ==
* Fix for issue around green dot visibility.
* {{Bug|MCL-22241}} - Launcher Update breaks Launcher (GLIBC_2.29 not found).
